channel.title: New User Introductions Thread!
channel.description:
Hi, Everyone,
Now our community is just getting started, we want to encourage you to let us know a little bit about yourself. So, please **reply to this topic** and let us know:
* Who you are and where you are from * What interests you about MESG * What kind of apps you are interested in building
To get us started, I am [Jono Bacon](http://www.jonobacon.com), based in California, and I am a consultant who works with the MESG team. I help companies build communities and I am excited to be working with the MESG team!
Introduce away!

item.title: New User Introductions Thread!
item.dc:creator: Anthony
item.description:
Hello @PrezEsco, welcome, feel free to ask any question, we will do our best to help you to get started with MESG.

I realize I didn’t do my introduction so here it is.

My name is Anthony Estebe, I’m the co-founder and CEO of MESG. I’m what we could call a biz-dev person, passionate about technologies and their impact on the world and also passionate about entrepreneurship with few existing companies created over the past 10 years.

I love the concept of blockchain and decentralization in general, it’s something that totally makes sense and I believe will make application development and businesses easier. This is one of my big motivation with MESG, helping any developer and businesses create the product they need easily with the best latest technologies without having unnecessary complexity.

Read full topic

item.title: New User Introductions Thread!
item.dc:creator: PrezEsco
item.description:
What’s up guys my name is Perez from Los Angeles California. I’m new to this project. Nice to meet everyone

Read full topic
